about_the_game:
Dear new friends, old friends, big friends and children:

This is a simple game of tank play. The main driver of the game is to get points to experience different tanks. There are 16 different tanks, and hopefully one you will like.

In the game, you can use additional armor features to provide a certain amount of additional protection for the weak parts of the tank.
In defense mode, you can use a train box obstacle to provide some cover for yourself.
In endless mode, only one tank can be used in, but as a bonus, the tank's loading time can be reduced to one second, giving you a unique high-speed combat experience.

I have to mention some things is that, due to my limited ability, can to add any sound music to the game, this players please be careful to buy. Due to the production difficulties caused by the old computer graphics card, some special effects that should be added to the game are temporarily blank, and I will make up as much as possible in the future.

Finally, if you are willing to try the game but hesitate, please download a brief demo version, experience the operation and game style, and then consider.

If you have some good ideas to share, please be sure to contact me. QQ group number: 496979202
Finally, I wish you a happy, solo dance Ming Zhong respect on.
detailed_description:
Dear new friends, old friends, big friends and children:

This is a simple game of tank play. The main driver of the game is to get points to experience different tanks. There are 16 different tanks, and hopefully one you will like.

In the game, you can use additional armor features to provide a certain amount of additional protection for the weak parts of the tank.
In defense mode, you can use a train box obstacle to provide some cover for yourself.
In endless mode, only one tank can be used in, but as a bonus, the tank's loading time can be reduced to one second, giving you a unique high-speed combat experience.

I have to mention some things is that, due to my limited ability, can to add any sound music to the game, this players please be careful to buy. Due to the production difficulties caused by the old computer graphics card, some special effects that should be added to the game are temporarily blank, and I will make up as much as possible in the future.

Finally, if you are willing to try the game but hesitate, please download a brief demo version, experience the operation and game style, and then consider.

If you have some good ideas to share, please be sure to contact me. QQ group number: 496979202
Finally, I wish you a happy, solo dance Ming Zhong respect on.
legal_notice: This game is independently produced by me, part of the material from the Unreal Mall, if you have any questions, please contact me: 770677876@qq.com
name: 坦克猎手2

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750 Ti
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7及以上
  • Processor: Intel core i7-4790
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1650
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: It is a third-person shooter, and the main driver is to get points and experience different tanks. There are 16 different tanks, and hopefully one you will like. The game has prepared nine broad enough maps for players to freely attack and ambush.
supported_languages: Simplified Chinese, English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Japanese, Portuguese - Brazil, Korean
